text: Beezy Bear is a 1955 Disney animated short. It features Donald Duck, who appears as a beekeeper.“Bearly” a Star: A Tribute To Disney’s Humphrey the Bear-Cartoon Research This is Humphrey the Bear's fifth appearance. The cartoon portrays Humphrey as a honey-stealing bear. ==Voice cast== * Donald Duck: Clarence Nash * Humphrey the Bear: Jimmy MacDonald * J. Audubon Woodlore: Bill Thompson ==Home media== The short was released on November 11, 2008 on Walt Disney Treasures: The Chronological Donald, Volume Four: 1951-1961. It is also available on Disney+.Disney+ ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Disney animated movies Category:Donald Duck
title: Beezy Bear
